sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import Dialog from '@material-ui/core/Dialog' import DialogActions from '@material-ui/core/DialogActions' import DialogContent from '@material-ui/core/DialogContent' import { AccountCircle } from '@material-ui/icons' // import Form from '../form' import { Container, Title } from './styles' import { useUser } from '../../providers/users' import { ModalContext } from '../../providers/modal' import { useForm } from '../../providers/formUser' export const FormDialog: React.FC = () => { const { openModal, closeModal, state } = useContext(ModalContext) const { validateUser, createUsers } = useUser() const { isValid } = useForm() const submit = e => { e.preventDefault() validateUser() if (isValid) { createUsers() && closeModal() } } return (
{state ? 'Editar Usuario' : 'Novo Usuario'} {/*
*/}
) }
